::Quatro/Hakibuscon::

    Quatro went inside Maximal City.  He walked arou=
nd, holding his phase disruptor rifle in his right hand.  He was planning w=
hat to do next to kill for the bounty on a few Preds & Decepts...
~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    Hakibuscon wanted t=
o hunt down a few transformers, but also wanted to kill his new rival, Quat=
ro, and gain the most bounty.  He transformed to speedy-chameleon mode(cham=
eleon w/ wheels, see my posts with him before I left the RPG) and zoomed of=
f to the Dark Avian.  He needed to have a good alliance with the Decepticon=
s and Predacons to get at the Maximal bounty he was after...


~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~LurkerAbyss~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~The Keeper O=
f Souls~
~The Shadow Of The Dark~
~I Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
